def main():
    A, B = map(int, input().split())
    print(A - B)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

#-----main-----

a, b = map(int, input().split())

if a <= b:
    print(0)
else:
    print(a - b - 1)
#-----main-----

a, b = map(int, input().split()) #a,bに数値を入力

if a <= b: #aがb以下の場合
    print(0)
else: #aがbより大きい場合
    print(a - b)


def main():
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    print(a + b)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
